00027 // structure to store a VCF header
00028 struct VCFHeader {
00029 
00030   VCFHeader() {}
00031   ~VCFHeader() {}
00032 
00033   VCFHeader(string file);
00034 
00035   string fileformat = "VCFv4.2";
00036   string filedate;
00037   string source;
00038   string reference = "hg19";
00039   string colnames = "#CHROM\tPOS\tID\tREF\tALT\tQUAL\tFILTER\tINFO\tFORMAT";
00040 
00041   InfoMap infomap; 
00042   FilterMap filtermap;
00043   FormatMap formatmap;
00044   SampleMap samplemap;
00045 
00046   ContigFieldMap contigfieldmap;
00047   
00048   // output it to a string
00049   friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& out, const VCFHeader& v);
00050 
00051   //set the filedate string to the current date
00052   void setCurrentDate();
00053 
00054   //add an info field
00055   void addInfoField(string field, string number, string type, string description);
00056 
00057   void addFilterField(string field, string description);
00058   void addFormatField(string field, string number, string type, string description);
00059   void addSampleField(string field);
00060 
00061   void addContigField(string id, string assembly, string length, string species);
00062 
00063 };

00100 struct VCFEntryPair {
00101 
00102   VCFEntryPair(VCFEntry t1, VCFEntry t2) : e1(t1), e2(t2) {}

00112   string idcommon;

00121 
00122   bool hasOverlap() const { return overlap_partner != ""; }
